parameters.name: App
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: Template
parameters.description:
The transcoding template ID. Valid values:

*   Standard transcoding:

    *   lld: low definition
    *   lsd: standard definition
    *   lhd: high definition
    *   lud : ultra-high definition

*   Narrowband HDâ„¢ transcoding:

    *   ld: low definition
    *   sd: standard definition
    *   hd: high definition
    *   ud: ultra-high definition

*   Custom transcoding: a custom ID
